RecAlrtDataSrcExpSetDef.name: RecAlrtDataSrcExpSetDef
RecAlrtDataSrcExpSetDef.description: Represents information about the data source for a record alert and the association with an expression set definition.

DeveloperName.description: A unique name of a record alert expression set definition

ExpressionSetDefinitionId.description: The expression set definition that's associated with the data source of a record alert.

ExpressionSetObject.description: Specifies the name of the object that's related to the expression set.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record alert data source is active (true) or not (false).

Language.description: The language of the expression set definition

MasterLabel.description: A unique name of a record alert data source expression set definition.

NamespacePrefix.description: A namespace prefix associated with this object.

RecordAlertDataSourceId.description: The data source of the record alert that's associated with an expression set.
